title: What's next?
content:
Hi, my name is Gabriel and I'm a brazilian designer with large experience (about 12 years) in graphic and interactive design, including web design and programming.

I'm checking out the Typophile website, seeing what's going on.
author: gabriel.so

comments.content:
Welcome.

There are others from South America here and possibly Brazil. I think you will enjoy this site a lot.

Stephen Rapp

OK, bienvenido

también se habla español.-
